summary: A demented widow lures unsuspecting children into her mansion in a bizarre "Hansel and Gretel" twist.
cast: Shelley Winters|Mark Lester|Chloe Franks|Ralph Richardson|Lionel Jeffries|Hugh Griffith|Rosalie Crutchley|Pat Heywood|Judy Cornwell|Michael Gothard|Jackie Cowper|Richard Beaumont|Charlotte Sayce|Marianne Stone
title: ¿Quién mató a tía Roo?
